rules_text:
[i]Otherworld[/i] – Choose two. If an opponent has been burdened three or more times, choose any number instead.
• Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
• Investigate. [i](Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
• Populate [i](Create a token that’s a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]
